properties.description: Docker on QingCloud

properties.label: Name
properties.description: The name of the Docker service

properties.label: Description
properties.description: The description of the Docker service

properties.label: vxnet
properties.description: Choose a vxnet to join

properties.label: Docker node
properties.description: Docker node properties

properties.label: loadbalancer
properties.description: Choose a loadbalancer service (When you create loadbalancer, you need to select the Internet type. Loadbalancer listener need to enable Session Sticky. Listener protocol should be http)

properties.label: CPU
properties.description: CPUs of each node

properties.label: Memory
properties.description: Memory of each node

properties.label: Instance Class
properties.description: The instance type for the cluster to run, such as high performance, high performance plus

properties.label: Node Count
properties.description: Number of nodes for the cluster to create

properties.label: Volume Size
properties.description: The volume size for each node

properties.label: Docker client node
properties.description: Docker client node properties

properties.label: CPU
properties.description: CPUs of this client node

properties.label: Memory
properties.description: Memory of this client node

properties.label: Instance Class
properties.description: The instance type for this node to run, such as high performance, high performance plus

properties.label: Volume Size
properties.description: The volume size for this client node
Docker service properties

properties.label: The location of Docker mirror registry server
properties.description: The location of Docker mirror registry server, currently only support offcial DockerHub registration server

properties.label: User name
properties.description: User name to access Docker registry server, will use guest account if leaving it empty, guest accout is supported by offical dockerhub site and dockerhub.qingcloud.com

properties.label: Password
properties.description: Password to access Docker registry server, will use guest account if leaving it empty, guest accout is supported by offical dockerhub site and dockerhub.qingcloud.com

properties.label: This pull URL is secure or not
properties.description: This pull URL is secure or not, will add domain to insecure-registries if choosing 'no'

properties.label: URL for pull request
properties.description: URL for pull request, for example, dockerhub.qingcloud.com/guest/image:tag

properties.label: The executed command when starting a Docker container
properties.description: The executed command when starting a Docker container, only for the image which has ENTRYPOINT but no CMD

properties.label: This upgrade URL is secure or not
properties.description: This upgrade URL is secure or not, will add domain to insecure-registries if choosing 'no'

properties.label: URL for upgrade request
properties.description: URL for upgrade request, for example, dockerhub.qingcloud.com/guest/image:tag

properties.label: Volume path
properties.description: Volume path in running container, which will be mapped with '/data/docker_data' folder on host node, please input the full path

properties.label: Port
properties.description: Port exposed by running container, which will be mapped with '80' port on host node

properties.label: IP address of Elastic Search server
properties.description: IP address of Elastic Search server, leave it empty if you don't need Elastic Search server to manage trace

properties.label: Port of Elastic Search server
properties.description: Port of Elastic Search server,  leave it empty if you don't need Elastic Search server to manage trace
